name: STECInfectionTestsForShigaToxinGenesOrSTECEHECOrEColiO157NucleicAcid
title: STEC Infection (Tests for Shiga toxin genes, or STEC, EHEC, or E. coli O157 Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Shiga toxin genes, or STEC, EHEC, or E. coli O157 nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Escherichia coli O157 probe; Escherichia coli O157:H7 probe; Escherichia coli shiga-like toxin; shiga toxin probe;  

LOINC search: "(O157 or shiga or enterohemorrhagic or verotoxic) nucleic -isolate -culture -milk -panel‚Äù),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
